mapper.select: SELECT am.ATTENDANCE_CODE AS attendanceCode, am.EMP_ID AS empId, ei.EMP_NAME AS empName, pi.POS_NAME AS positionName, di.DEPT_NAME AS departmentName, ati.ATTENDANCE_TYPE_NAME AS attendanceTypeName, am.START_DATE AS startDate, am.END_DATE AS endDate, am.REASON AS reason, am.CREATION_DATE AS creationDate, am.TITLE AS title FROM TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT am JOIN TB_EMPLOYMENT_INFO ei ON am.EMP_ID = ei.EMP_ID JOIN TB_ATTENDANCE_TYPE_INFO ati ON am.ATTENDANCE_TYPE_CODE = ati.ATTENDANCE_TYPE_CODE JOIN TB_POSITION_INFO pi ON ei.POS_CODE = pi.POS_CODE JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT_INFO di ON ei.DEPT_CODE = di.DEPT_CODE WHERE am.ASSIGN_CODE = '1000' ORDER BY am.CREATION_DATE
